iep_goals: Demonstrate functional academic skills at 6th grade level across core subjects with 75% accuracy
Complete job training activities and follow multi-step work instructions with 80% independence
accommodations: Modified curriculum with functional life skills focus
learning_styles: learns best through hands-on, practical applications
benefits from repetition and consistent routines

interviews.parent: Parent reports Blake is friendly and hardworking. They want him to develop job skills and live as independently as possible.
interviews.teacher: Blake is eager to help others and takes pride in completing tasks. He's learning job skills through school-based enterprises.

observations.psychologist: Below-average intellectual functioning with strengths in social skills and work motivation. Benefits from structured, supportive learning environment.
